SolarSailorAustralian/aSolar Sailor's unique "Hybrid Power System" (HPS) for marine applications is a world first with patents in USA, Australia, NZ and Turkey and pending in 22 other countries including China, Japan and Europe. The system uses energy from renewable sources such as the sun and wind and combines these with stored energy from batteries and fossil fuel. The system is controlled by a computer to provide ships with power that is operationally efficient, quiet, and environmentally friendly. The Solar Sailor technology is now being adapted for a variety of marine applications such as eco-tourism, tourism, urban transport, leisure and cargo ships. The Solar Sailor technology has been proven in a commercial tourist vessel with operation of the 100-passenger Sydney Solar Sailor since June 2000 by Captain Cook Cruises on Sydney Harbour. The Solar Sailor Hybrid Power System is superior to conventional marine power in terms of lower operating costs (fuel savings and maintenance), zero water pollution, significant reductions in air pollution and greenhouse gas emissions, and greater passenger comfort through reduced noise, vibration and noxious odour emissions. The Hybrid Power System is so efficient because;Incorporates free solar and wind power abundant on the water. No gearboxes;No auxillary generators;Always generator at optimum revs/efficiency;Since its launch, the Sydney Solar Sailor and the Solar Sailor® concept have received a number of industry awards for design, environmental attributes and technology. These include;2001 Australian Design Award of the Year – Engineering;2000 International Cargo Handling Co-ordination Association (ICHCA) Awards – Outstanding Proven Initiative in Cargo Handling;2000 Boating industry Association of Australia (BIA) Marine Awards – Best New Product;1999 Far Eastern Economic Review/Du Pont Asian Innovation Award – Gold Medal;1997 Advanced Technology Boat Race Canberra Australia – Major Prize;The Solar Sailor technology has been developed with assistance and support from the Australian Greenhouse Office, a department of the Australian Federal Government, the Australian Technology Showcase, an initiative of the New South Wales State Government, BP Solar, Panasonic Australia, University of Technology Sydney (UTS), CI Technologies Pty Ltd, (Citect), and Elgas.

Evergreen CP USA

About us
EVERGREEN (CP) USA, INC. is a quality supplier of batteries to the OEM and consumer trades.
EVERGREEN was established in South San Francisco in 1986, as the sales office and distribution center in the US for Chung Pak Battery Works Ltd., one of the leading consumer and dry-cell battery manufacturers worldwide.
EVERGREEN has since expanded operations to include offices in North Charleston, SC and sales to all of the Americas.
EVERGREEN offers a wide range of environmentally friendly batteries that are Mercury and Cadmium Free:
-	Alkaline
-	Zinc Chloride
-	Alkaline Manganese & Silver Oxide Button Cells
-	Lithium
-	Nickel Cadmium
-	Nickel Metal Hydride
Our ongoing mission is to:
-	Promote â€œGreen Powerâ€� for a better environment;
-	Provide excellent product quality and reliability;
-	Provide outstanding customer service, competitive prices and timely delivery.

Evergreen CP USA Information
EVERGREEN (CP) USA, INC. is a quality supplier of batteries to the OEM and consumer trades.
EVERGREEN was established in South San Francisco in 1986, as the sales office and distribution center in the US for Chung Pak Battery Works Ltd., one of the leading consumer and dry-cell battery manufacturers worldwide.
EVERGREEN has since expanded operations to include offices in North Charleston, SC and sales to all of the Americas.
EVERGREEN offers a wide range of environmentally friendly batteries that are Mercury and Cadmium Free:
-	Alkaline
-	Zinc Chloride
-	Alkaline Manganese & Silver Oxide Button Cells

results.title: Intermediate Chemicals Producer | Waggaman | Cornerstone Chemical
results.content: A Safe Producer of Intermediate Chemicals. The Cornerstone Energy Park sits on 800 acres in Waggaman, LA, just outside of New Orleans, and represents a significant economic and civic investment in the local community and the state of Louisiana.. Our facility manufactures high-quality products that are shipped around the globe, including acrylonitrile, melamine, sulfuric acid and urea.
results.raw_content:
New Scholarship Program!
A Safe Producer of Intermediate Chemicals
We thrive on People Power!
A Committed Corporate Citizen
A Contributor to Helping the U.S. Military Fly Faster
A Safe Producer of Intermediate Chemicals
The Cornerstone Energy Park sits on 800 acres in Waggaman, LA, just outside of New Orleans, and represents a significant economic and civic investment in the local community and the state of Louisiana.
Our facility manufactures high-quality products that are shipped around the globe, including acrylonitrile, melamine, sulfuric acid and urea. These products go into goods that make life safer, help improve and protect the environment, and improve the longevity of many articles we use daily.
Our focus is on safety, environmental protection, and employee health in the production of these high-quality products. From regularly auditing our plant areas to conducting environmental protection programs and employee wellness assessments, we're demonstrating operational excellence and safety in everything we do.
Learn more
Cornerstone – From Energy to Innovation
At Cornerstone, we're converting energy into industrial products on a large scale, safely and efficiently. Our team works together to reduce our environmental footprint while pursuing innovative industry advancements to make daily life easier, safer and cleaner for all.
From flat-screen TVs and household countertops to U.S. military aircraft components, our products power the goods used in business, health and safety, entertainment, national security and beyond.
Learn more
Serving Our Community
Our community is at the forefront of our operations. Fueled by a commitment to transparency and being a good neighbor, our Cornerstone community programs are making our neighborhoods better places to live and work.
Our team of approximately 500 employees regularly participates in educational and mentoring programs, charity events, outreach programs, and more to support important programs, inspire learning and help bolster our community’s workforce.
Learn more
High quality products used in everyday applications
A reactive building block monomer, acrylonitrile is used in the production of acrylamide, acrylic fibers, nitrile rubber, elastomers, ABS plastics, surface coating and many other products.
Cornerstone produces melamine, a major raw material used in coatings, resins, laminates, fire, retardants, molding compounds, wood adhesives and many other applications.
The most common chemical in use around the world, sulfuric acid, is used as a drying agent in the production of industrial gases.
Cornerstone produces high-quality urea solutions for use in agriculture, stationary NOx abatement and diesel exhaust fluids.
Cornerstone in our Community
Cornerstone employees have been generous contributors to the United Way Southeast Louisiana chapter for many years. Through this, Cornerstone repairs and improves schools, agencies, and homes in Jefferson Parish.
Cornerstone has committed to sustainability through our environmental protection program that works towards building a clean and sustainable environment for our employees and the Jefferson Parish community.
Cornerstone partners with local schools and community colleges on education and workforce development initiatives. In doing so, Cornerstone impacts our Jefferson Parish community by providing valuable career skills.
Cornerstone offers scholarships to eligible students who plan to pursue STEM-related degrees. Our Cornerstone Scholarship Program awards $1,000 scholarships to Jefferson Parish residents and the children of Cornerstone employees.
Contact Us!
Our team at Cornerstone thrives on community involvement and people power. We leverage industry knowledge and skills to create value for our employees, customers, shareholders, and community.
Our site is always looking for talented people to join our team and our mission.
Cornerstone careers offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits programs, and opportunities for personal and professional development. If you're interested in our site or job openings, read more about Cornerstone careers or fill out the contact form below.
Cornerstone Chemical Company
